attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-0002

Date: 2003-01-13

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to section 46 of the

Parliament of Canada Act, hereby appoints, for a period terminating on January 12, 2004, each of the following Members of the House of Commons to be Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister set out opposite the name of the Member:


Name of the Member

of the House of Commons




Minister




Mr. Rodger Cuzner



Prime Minister


Mr. Marcel Proulx


Minister of Transport


Mr. Alan Tonks


Minister of the Environment


Ms. Judy Sgro


Minister of Public Works and Government Services



Ms. Carole-Marie Allard



Minister of Canadian Heritage



Mr. Tony Tirabassi



President of the Treasury Board



Ms. Diane St-Jacques



Minister of Human Resources Development



Mr. Joe Peschisolido



President of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada and Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs


Mr. Murray Calder


Minister for International Trade


Mr. Claude Duplain


Minister of Agriculture and

Agri-Food


Ms. Nancy Karetak-Lindell


Minister of Natural Resources


Mr. Charles Hubbard


Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development


Ms. Colleen Beaumier


Minister of National Revenue


Mr. Sarkis Assadourian


Minister of Citizenship and Immigration





.../2




- 2 -





Mr. Ivan Grose


Minister of Veterans Affairs






Mr. André Harvey


Minister for International Cooperation






Mr. Dominic LeBlanc


Minister of National Defence






Ms. Marlene Jennings


Solicitor General of Canada
